body: So close to being happy and wholesome. Theyll get there eventually if things continue like this but Im a bit dissapointed they dont show it. I mean her Bf kicks her out cause he's a dick so she gets picked up by the MC and they have sex and she loves it. Then at the end she keeps coming back to fuck him because she likes sex with the MC more (and loves him)... so then why not break up with the BF and live eith the MC? Wtf. Im just gonna assume thats what happens eventually.
